# CHANGELOG

## 0.2.1 (2018-08-06)
- Fix docstring in packFloatBits_()

## 0.2.0 (2018-08-06)
- API change: IEEE754Buffer.pack(buffer, num, index) instead of IEEE754Buffer.pack(buffer, index, num)

## 0.1.0 (2018-08-05)
- API change: IEEE754Buffer as a class

## 0.0.2 (2018-08-04)
- UMD compatible with IE6+
